text:
6⃣ Does drinking lots of water every 15 minutes flush out the new #coronavirus & protects against #COVIDー19?

A: There is no evidence that drinking lots of water flushes out the new coronavirus. However, for good health, it is recommended to have adequate water🥤

#COVID19 https://t.co/8xsegfAsYO
